thought.text: Let me try a different approach. Since the issue is about the units module, let me check if I can work with the source code directly without building the entire package:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmp8oam9r6h/astropy && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import astropy.units as u; print('Units module imported successfully')"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmp8oam9r6h/astropy && python -c \"import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import astropy.units as u; print('Units module imported successfully')\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
